sentences: Martin Cooper (born 1 October 1958) is an English painter and a musician.
He is the secondary keyboardist and occasional saxophonist for the band Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark, whom he first joined in 1980.
From 1980 until 1989, he was a member of the new wave group Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark.
In 1981, he briefly left OMD to join Dave Hughes for a project called Godot.
After OMD split in 1989, Cooper formed The Listening Pool with ex-OMD members Paul Humphreys and Malcolm Holmes.
Cooper studied art at the Laird School of Art in Birkenhead.
He obtained a first class honours degree in Fine Arts at the Sheffield College of Art in 1980.
Since leaving OMD, Cooper has devoted most of his time and energy to his painting.
